transcript: Because she knows what I know, that's why. She's faithful as a rock in my darkest moments, I think of her waiting and I know that I'm right.

segments.text: Because she knows what I know, that's why.
She's faithful as a rock in my darkest moments, I think of her waiting and I know that I'm right.
